name: Radeon Mecha
description:
The Game

In the distant future, Radeon Technology has harnessed the power of nuclear fusion to fuel large mechs.  While nations compete in an arms race to build the most capable weapons, only one mecha is prepared to take on the sudden alien invasion...

This game has Windows gamepad support.

(Note: This game is in Alpha, so it is quite limited in features... and story...)

Attributions

This project uses the Pixeled Font by OmegaPC777

Source: https://www.dafont.com/pixeled.font

Known Bugs

On high refresh rate displays (tested on a 144hz display), the Mecha will dash upon hitting resume.  This is not an issue at 60hz.

Untested Areas

This game has been built, but not tested, for MacOS and Linux.  However, everything should be working properly.
